summary: Texan farmers the Frake family head for the Texas State Fair in Dallas. The parents are focused on winning the competitions for livestock and cooking. However, their restless daughter Margy and her brother Wayne meet attractive new love interests.
cast: Pat Boone|Bobby Darin|Pamela Tiffin|Ann-Margret|Tom Ewell|Alice Faye|Wally Cox|David Brandon|Clem Harvey|Robert Foulk|Linda Henrich|Tap Canutt|Bebe Allen|Sheila Allen|Walter Beilby|Herman Boden|Jack Carr|Earl Chaney|Margaret Deramee|Mary Durant|Anita Gordon|Claude Hall|Albert Harris|Mike Lally|Bill Lee|Tom Loughney|Jim Lowe|Rex May|Edwin McClure|Meat Loaf|George Russell|Tony Zoppi
title: State Fair
